That tight loop between devs and miners - humans - choosing economics was never the intention of # bitcoin
Most of us got into # bitcoin to get -away- from systems where a few humans dictate supply & pricing. Soft forks need -zero- network consent.
Soft forks create tight loop of 1) Handful of humans code an -economics- change to # bitcoin 2) Handful of human miners approve change
The only way to opt out of the latest centralized-miner-filter update is to leave bitcoin.
